news.title: Warren Buffett charity lunch fetches winning bid of $19 mln - Reuters
news.description: A lucky, and likely wealthy, person bid more than $19 million to dine with Warren Buffett, in the 21st and final time that the billionaire businessman auctioned a private lunch to benefit a San Francisco charity.
news.content: June 17 (Reuters) - A lucky, and likely wealthy, person bid more than $19 million to dine with Warren Buffett, in the 21st and final time that the billionaire businessman auctioned a private lunch to… [+2290 chars]

news.title: The US urged to establish common smartphone charger following new EU policy
news.description: After the EU set a requirement for device makers to adopt USB-C, U.S. senators are now urging the country to do the same.
news.content:
• The European Union recently established a new policy for a common smartphone charger by 2024.
  • This would require companies to use USB-C with small and medium-sized electronics such as… [+2071 chars]

news.title: DOOM Ported to Sega Naomi Arcade Hardware
news.description: Porting DOOM to new hardware and software platforms is a fun pastime for many in the hacker scene. [DragonMinded] noticed that nobody had ported the game to the Sega Naomi arcade hardware, and set ...
